sentences.en: Mahone calls Michael to warn him and to explain that he won't squeal.
sentences.cn: 马宏打电话给迈可警告他，并解释说他不会告密。

sentences.en: He stopped with a squeal of brakes.
sentences.cn: 他嘎的一声把车刹住了。

sentences.en: He heard tyres squeal as the car braked to avoid a collision.
sentences.cn: 他听到当汽车刹车为避免撞车时轮胎发出了刺耳的尖声。
